nodes.text: Baron Karoll Cilarnus was a noble presumably of one of the Tapani houses and the owner of a company. He had the nickname Baron Karoll "The Mad" Cilarnus.

The Pelagia Duplex Command Assault Gunship ("Orphanmaker") was developed to protect the Tapani sector from the chaos of the Great Sith War. The ship won the admiration of Baron Cilarnus who sought to develop a version with twice the armament and in drive yards, it was nicknamed "Overkill". The Baron never managed to fly the ship as his company was placed into receivership following a series of unsound investments. The ship was eventually acquired by the Moomo Brothers who named it Moomo Williwaw.
